titleStmt.title: Baptism and the Lord's Supper substantially asserted being an apology in behalf of the people called Quakers, concerning those two heads / by Robert Barclay.
titleStmt.author: Barclay, Robert, 1648-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: Robert Barclay [son of the author].
Error in paging: p. 53-54 omitted in numbering only.
Duplicate copies of this work appear on reels 342 and 1663.
Copy on reel 342 has bound at end [1] p. of advertisements; copy on reel 1663 has [9] p. of advertisements, also bound at end.
Reproduction of originals in the Friends' Library and the Huntington Library.
